example.title: Code listing: the result from the markers in the YDTimer class
example.programlisting: array ( '-- Start' => array ( 0 => 0, 1 => 0, 2 => '-- Start', ), 'Reading file' => array ( 0 => 0, 1 => 0, 2 => 'Reading file', ), 'Finished reading file' => array ( 0 => 0, 1 => 0, 2 => 'Finished reading file', ), 'YDBBCode object' => array ( 0 => 0, 1 => 0, 2 => 'YDBBCode object', ), 'Conversion to BBCode' => array ( 0 => 0, 1 => 0, 2 => 'Conversion to BBCode', ), )
